channel.title: David Robert - Data Scientist / ML Engineer
channel.description: Recent content on David Robert - Data Scientist / ML Engineer

item.title: The Power of RAG in Modern LLMs
item.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is a powerful technique that combines the generative power of Large Language Models (LLMs) with the factual grounding of an external knowledge base. This approach helps to reduce hallucinations and provide more accurate, up-to-date responses. In this post, we’ll explore the basic architecture of a RAG system.

item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.description: This is the first post on my new blog. I’ll be writing about topics in AI, Machine Learning, and software development. Stay tuned!

item.title: Rustyroboz.com - VR Experiments
item.description: This project is a playground for exploring virtual reality experiences and integrating intelligent agents using Unity 3D. It serves as a practical application of AI concepts in an interactive environment.

item.title: AI-Powered Customer Support Chatbot
item.description: Developed a proof-of-concept chatbot that leverages a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system to provide accurate answers to customer questions based on a private knowledge base. The backend is served via a FastAPI container.

item.title: Real-Time Object Detection in Video Streams
item.description: This project focused on building and optimizing a real-time object detection pipeline using YOLOv5. The system processes video streams and identifies a predefined set of objects with high accuracy and low latency, suitable for applications in security or automated monitoring.
